com.lukflug.panelstudio.theme

Class Windows31Theme

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.theme.ThemeBase
      • com.lukflug.panelstudio.theme.Windows31Theme
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITheme

    public class Windows31Theme
extends ThemeBase
    Theme replacting the look of Windows 3.1.
